item.title: Interesting def training? New way
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

Um

case 1: int NPCS = server.NpcHandler.npcs[i]; if(actionTimer < 1){ NPCS.textUpdate = "Free defense experience"; NPCS.updateRequired = true; NPCS.textUpdateRequired = true; addSkillXP(1, 1); sendMessage("Oh my god, experience."); actionTimer = 20; } if(actionTimer > 0){ sendMessage("It would be mighty rude to bother him without waiting."); } break;

something along the lines of that may work?

EDIT: The method “SpeakPls” would cover the player talking I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: Interesting def training? New way
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Possible, most likely.

Talking to an npc with the chat thingy, cna teleport you to somewhere. So instead of them teleing you to somewhere, they add xp.

Making something above their head, not sure.

Not sure if you can set the emote off at certain times, when they’re talked to.

You can have the second 2 set off at random though :\
